description: Test cases for user profile viewing and editing

test_cases.name: Display Profile Screen
test_cases.expected_result: Profile screen displays with user avatar, name, skill level, and stats

test_cases.name: Display User Avatar and Name
test_cases.expected_result: Avatar with initials (e.g., 'AB') and full name displayed

test_cases.name: Display Skill Level
test_cases.expected_result: Skill level displayed (e.g., 'Intermediate') with games count (e.g., '120 games')

test_cases.name: Display Statistics Grid
test_cases.expected_result: Stats displayed: Bookings count (32), Avg rating (4.6), Friends count (12)

test_cases.name: Edit Profile Button
test_cases.expected_result: Edit mode enabled or user navigated to edit profile screen

test_cases.name: Close Profile Without Changes
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Home screen

test_cases.name: Log Out from Profile
test_cases.expected_result: User logged out, session cleared, redirected to Login screen

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Home
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Home screen

test_cases.name: Profile Header Information
test_cases.expected_result: Header shows 'My Profile' title and 'Edit your skills & bookings' subtitle
